_comment: This is the JSON configuration file to run the PVT-SPP GPS-only positioning algorithm.

log._comment: Configuration of the Log File (Possible values: DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL).

inputs._comment2: snr threshold to discard RINEX observables (compare with snr control digit). [1-4]: bad, [5:8]: good, 9: excellent

arc._comment1: Select first and last epochs in estimation arc in format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss

rate._comment: Select the input data rate (in seconds). The rate must be consistent with the RINEX OBS rate. Select false to disable.

troposphere._comment: Select Tropospheric model: 0 - no model, 1 - a priori Saastamoinen model

ionosphere._comment: Select Ionospheric model: 0 - no model, 1 - Klobuchar model, 2 - Iono Free Observables (requires 2 frequencies)

relativistic_corrections._comment: Enable / disable relativistic corrections: 0 - disable, 1 - enable

gps_solver._comment: GPS solver module (Single Frequency Single Constellation SPP)

iterations._comment: maximum number of iterations in iterative procedure

stop_criteria._comment: stop condition to end iterated least squares. Process ends when (RMS(i-1) - RMS(i)) / RMS(i-1) <= stop_criteria

signal_strength_filter._comment: Signal strength (SNR) filter. Select value of SNR (dBHz) threshold. Use high value to disable the filter

elevation_filter._comment: Elevation filter. Select the value of minimum elevation angle to consider, in degree. Use high value to disable the filter.

satellite_status._comment: whether or not to check the SV Accuracy (URA) and SV health fields of the navigation message

transmission_time_alg._comment: Select algorithm to compute the transmission time: 0 - geometric, 1 - pseudorange

true_position._comment: True/reference receiver coordinates with respect to ECEF frame
